resources.string: These types of notifications will be sent during CodeDay, such as announcements from organizers and activity reminders.
To get started, tap the button below to scan your CodeDay ticket.
‚Ä¶or look up your ticket via email
Sorry, we couldn\'t find that ticket.
We\'ll notify you when it\'s time to check in. Meanwhile, why not share the CodeDay hype?!
Want to skip the check-in line? Tap here to check in right now.

"We might be a little biased, but we think CodeDay is pretty fun. We designed it to be fun, in fact. But it's even more fun with friends, so tell a friend about CodeDay and help us help you help us all."
Please note that this is the alpha version of Companion! Lots of things are still being added. That said, let us know in Slack if you find any bugs :)
It\'s here, it\'s here! CodeDay has finally arrived, and this app is finally made useful! We hope you\'re super excited :)

At the moment, there\'s nothing much to see here. But during CodeDay, you\'ll see stuff like announcements from the organizers and reminders for upcoming activities. For now, though, we have a countdown to CodeDay so you can get hyped!
Want to skip the check-in line?
With CodeDay Companion, you can totally skip the check-in line with self check-in. Simply open the app when you arrive, check yourself in, and show your phone to an organizer. Simple as that.
Please fill out your age and parent info now so you don\'t need to at the door. Thanks!
You (or your parent) will need to fill out the waiver before you can attend. Please do that now so you don\'t need to at the event, thanks!
